text:
What's the easiest free thing out there for creating 3D model from photos? I feel like I want something half way between SketchUp "match photo" and Photosynth (RIP).

Shouldn't it be fairly easy to let me assist a Photosynth-style automated system by roughly arranging the photos in space and then marking some points as identical...?

elements.text:

Shouldn't it be fairly easy to let me assist a Photosynth-style automated system by roughly arranging the photos in space and then marking some points as identical...?

text: I am trying to get a photo of what something would look like with a wall knocked down. I can take pictures of both sides of the wall but I need to combine projected images

elements.text: I am trying to get a photo of what something would look like with a wall knocked down. I can take pictures of both sides of the wall but I need to combine projected images

text: Would anyone be interested in a meetup this summer in York (UK)? I'm thinking around Saturday 20th August. I was planning a mini-conference but think it might be too short notice to arrange talks for this year. I would still like to use the same venue which is a farmhouse/land a friend of mine owns as it's very scenic/relaxed and would allow for a lot of outdoor gathering spaces, but we'd have to pay for use of it - tickets would be £60 for the weekend. Some more details here and I'll post more photos this week, obviously the schedule wouldn't apply if we did just a meetup (except maybe the jam making :smile:) - <https://focus-2022.vercel.app>

text: Since I live in York, this would have been great, but unfortunately I'm not available the later half of August.  Looks like an interesting venue!

text: That's great! I want to go to there from Japan with a lightning talk about my no-code app, Desk. I'm glad if remote participation is ok. Do you plan something like it?

elements.text: That's great! I want to go to there from Japan with a lightning talk about my no-code app, Desk. I'm glad if remote participation is ok. Do you plan something like it?

text: Yeah, a talk would be great! Interested to hear more about Desk - I'll DM you
